Detailed Description

Implementation of ConditionsHandlerBase that can be used to propagate conditions data that were generated at runtime.

This is necessary if the output of a processor should trigger a ConditionsChangeListener The data will get an infinite validity time intervall assigned.

Author:
Benjamin.Lutz@desy.de
Date:
Dec 2008
Version:
1.0
